7817.quoteText:
Indemnity

By using this site you agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless the web site, its officers, directors, employees and agents, from any claims, actions or demands, including without limitation reasonable legal and accounting fees, alleging or resulting from your use of the material or your breach of the terms of this agreement.
7817.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

tosdr.case: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

7818.quoteText: If any provision of this agreement is found to be invalid by any court having competent jurisdiction, the invalidity of such provision shall not affect the validity of the remaining provisions of this agreement, which shall remain in full force and effect.
7818.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

8448.quoteText: You may delete data from your account, or delete your entire account at any time.
8448.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

8451.quoteText:
Right to be Forgotten

Users may remove themselves and their information from the website's database at anytime by deleting their account through the settings section of our website.
8451.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
